summary: Stories of people who regard augmenting their bodies as a way of life, whether for artistic reasons or out of pure vanity.
cast: Gary Alter|Daryl Bear Belmares|Corey Busboom|Tim Cridland|Allen Falkner|Julio Garcia|Steve Haworth|Frank Marino|Masuimi Max|Fakir Musafar|Jonathan M Parrish|Erik 'Lizard Man' Sprague|Tiamat|Trigger|Jim Ward
title: Modify
